display_help: Projects a Shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. Shockwave travels in a wide arc in front of you dealing moderate damage and, possibly knocking down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: Projects a Shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. Shockwave travels in a wide arc in front of you dealing moderate damage and, possibly knocking down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
